__inputs.name: JMETER_DASHBOARD
__inputs.label: DB name
__inputs.description: Create a Datasource in Grafana that points to jmeter database

__inputs.name: VAR_SEND_INTERVAL
__inputs.label: Backend send interval
__inputs.description: in second, should match JMeter property "backend_influxdb.send_interval"

description: Overall views on test with links

targets.query: SELECT testRun FROM (SELECT testRun, text, time, application  FROM "events"  WHERE $timeFilter AND application=~/^$test$/ AND testRun=~/^.+$/ AND text=~/^.+?started$/) WHERE testRun=~/^$stability_tests$/ ORDER BY "time" DESC

SELECT "Avg"  FROM (SELECT mean("avg") AS "Avg",  count("avg") AS "Count" FROM "jmeter" WHERE application=~/^$test$/ AND "transaction"=~/^all$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY  testRun ORDER BY "time" DESC) WHERE "Count" > 4000 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY testRun ORDER BY "time" DESC
SELECT sum("countError") AS "error" FROM "jmeter" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$test$/ AND "transaction" = 'all') AND $timeFilter AND testRun=~/^$stability_tests$/ GROUP BY testRun
SELECT sum("count") AS "all" FROM "jmeter" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$test$/ AND "transaction" = 'all') AND $timeFilter AND testRun=~/^$stability_tests$/ GROUP BY testRun

SELECT "Count"*5/60 FROM (SELECT mean("avg") AS "Avg",  count("avg") AS "Count" FROM "jmeter" WHERE application=~/^$test$/ AND "transaction"=~/^all$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY  testRun ORDER BY "time" DESC) WHERE "Count" > 4000 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY testRun ORDER BY "time" DESC

SELECT "99%"  FROM (SELECT mean("pct99.0") AS "99%",  count("avg") AS "Count" FROM "jmeter" WHERE application=~/^$test$/ AND "transaction"=~/^all$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY  testRun ORDER BY "time" DESC) WHERE "Count" > 4000 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY testRun ORDER BY "time" DESC

SELECT testRun FROM (SELECT testRun, text, time, application  FROM "events"  WHERE $timeFilter AND application=~/^$test$/ AND testRun=~/^.+$/ AND text=~/^.+?started$/) WHERE testRun=~/^$stress_tests$/ ORDER BY "time" DESC

SELECT "Avg"  FROM (SELECT mean("avg") AS "Avg",  count("avg")*5 AS "Count" FROM "jmeter" WHERE application=~/^$test$/ AND "transaction"=~/^all$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY  testRun ORDER BY "time" DESC) WHERE "Count" > 3500 AND "Count"<4000 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY testRun ORDER BY "time" DESC
SELECT sum("countError") AS "error" FROM "jmeter" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$test$/ AND "transaction" = 'all') AND $timeFilter AND testRun=~/^$stress_tests$/ GROUP BY testRun
SELECT sum("count") AS "all" FROM "jmeter" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$test$/ AND "transaction" = 'all') AND $timeFilter AND testRun=~/^$stress_tests$/ GROUP BY testRun

SELECT "Count"/60 FROM (SELECT mean("avg") AS "Avg",  count("avg")*5 AS "Count" FROM "jmeter" WHERE application=~/^$test$/ AND "transaction"=~/^all$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY  testRun ORDER BY "time" DESC) WHERE "Count">3500 AND "Count"<4000 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY testRun ORDER BY "time" DESC

SELECT "99%"  FROM (SELECT mean("pct99.0") AS "99%",  count("avg")*5 AS "Count" FROM "jmeter" WHERE application=~/^$test$/ AND "transaction"=~/^all$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY  testRun ORDER BY "time" DESC) WHERE "Count">3500 AND "Count"<4000 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY testRun ORDER BY "time" DESC

SELECT testRun, application, time AS "X" FROM (SELECT testRun, text, time, application  FROM "events"  WHERE $timeFilter AND application=~/^$test$/ AND testRun=~/^.+$/ AND text=~/^.+?started$/) WHERE testRun=~/^$normal_tests$/ORDER BY "time" DESC
SELECT "Count" FROM (SELECT count("avg")*5 AS "Count" FROM "jmeter" WHERE "transaction"=~/^all$/ AND $timeFilter AND application=~/^$test$/ GROUP BY  testRun) WHERE "Count">1800 GROUP BY  testRun
SELECT "Count"*2 AS "L1" FROM (SELECT count("avg")*5 AS "Count" FROM "jmeter" WHERE "transaction"=~/^all$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY  testRun) WHERE "Count">1800 GROUP BY  testRun
SELECT testRun, time as "A" FROM (SELECT last("avg"), time FROM "jmeter" WHERE "transaction"=~/^all$/ AND $timeFilter AND application=~/^$test$/ GROUP BY  testRun)

styles.alias: Run ID link to test metrics dashboard

targets.query: SELECT testRun, application, time AS "X" FROM (SELECT testRun, text, time, application  FROM "events"  WHERE $timeFilter AND testRun=~/^.+$/ AND text=~/^.+?started$/) WHERE testRun=~/^$normal_tests$/ ORDER BY "time" DESC
SELECT "Count" FROM (SELECT count("avg")*5 AS "Count" FROM "jmeter" WHERE "transaction"=~/^all$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY  testRun) WHERE "Count">1800 GROUP BY  testRun
SELECT "Count"*2 AS "L1" FROM (SELECT count("avg")*5 AS "Count" FROM "jmeter" WHERE "transaction"=~/^all$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY  testRun) WHERE "Count">1800 GROUP BY  testRun
SELECT testRun, time as "A" FROM (SELECT last("avg"), time FROM "jmeter" WHERE "transaction"=~/^all$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY  testRun)

list.definition: SELECT "testRun" FROM (SELECT count("avg") as "COUNT" FROM "jmeter" WHERE application=~/^$test$/ AND "transaction"=~/^all$/ GROUP BY testRun) WHERE "COUNT">4000

list.name: stability_tests
list.query: SELECT "testRun" FROM (SELECT count("avg") as "COUNT" FROM "jmeter" WHERE application=~/^$test$/ AND "transaction"=~/^all$/ GROUP BY testRun) WHERE "COUNT">4000

list.definition: SELECT "testRun" FROM (SELECT count("avg")*5 as "COUNT" FROM "jmeter" WHERE  "transaction"=~/^all$/ GROUP BY testRun) WHERE "COUNT">1800

list.name: normal_tests
list.query: SELECT "testRun" FROM (SELECT count("avg")*5 as "COUNT" FROM "jmeter" WHERE  "transaction"=~/^all$/ GROUP BY testRun) WHERE "COUNT">1800

list.definition: SELECT "testRun" FROM (SELECT count("avg")*5 as "COUNT" FROM "jmeter" WHERE application=~/^$test$/ AND  "transaction"=~/^all$/ GROUP BY testRun) WHERE "COUNT">3500 AND "COUNT"<4000

list.query: SELECT "testRun" FROM (SELECT count("avg")*5 as "COUNT" FROM "jmeter" WHERE application=~/^$test$/ AND  "transaction"=~/^all$/ GROUP BY testRun) WHERE "COUNT">3500 AND "COUNT"<4000
